name: Black History Card Gallery
description:
Welcome to Black History Card Gallery!

A small Gallery with Cards turned into posters of various Black History figures!

From Inventors to Artists to Leaders to Athletes, the gallery has a small who's who of Black History figures. Take a look!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WSAD Keys = Move Around
  • Mouse = Look Around
  • Spacebar = Jump Around

The Black History Cards contained in the game came from some old Nick Jr. printables I found back in 2014, but could not find online anymore. I managed to find them on an old storage medium I had recently found.

Android Version can be side loaded and played on Ouya!

Unity Assets Used:

UFPS Ver 1 - Opsive
Picture Gallery - Mixaill

Music Used:
Eleven Reasons - Chilll
By Smartsound
